author: jeffp
msg: Made the getMonth and setMonth correspond to the more human representation
of month number (ie 1 = January instead of 0 = January).

author: jeffp
msg: Changed the month value representation in the month selector.
Changed it from an abbreviation to a number.
Fixed a node reference problem with the status selector. We were
referencing the wrong node when determining which item in the selector

author: jeffp
msg: Changed the month value representation in the Month selector.
Changed it from being the month abbreviation to a number.

author: jeffp
msg: Added a field to get a VDate value from a set of RunData parameters.

author: jeffp
msg: Initial release of an action to edit a a To Do item
